roleset.name: (bring to a) close
roleset.note: ADJOURN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'adjourn' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from adjourn.01-v)
ADJOURNMENT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry adjourn.01, OntoNotes grouping adjournment-n senses 1& 2; No mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from adjournment.01-n)

example.name: almost always passive
example.text: With most legislatures adjourned [*-1] for the year, small business is tallying its scorecard.

example.name: Arg 1, tmp
example.text: The bill passed before the adjournment of Congress for the summer.

example.name: Arg 1, tmp
example.text: The judge has declared an adjournment of the trial until October.

roleset.name: go from one location to another
roleset.note: ADJOURN-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from adjourn.02-v)

example.name: both args
example.text: What 's not in dispute is how-1 , following a council meeting , the alders adjourned to Brocach *-1 .

example.name: both args
example.text: To this Lord Ballindine consented, and they adjourned to the billiard-room;
